data.title: A legendary India vs Pakistan awaits: When and where to watch World Championship of Legends?
data.meta_description: India and Pakistan will face off in the final of the World Championship of Legends at Edgbaston Stadium on July 13. The match, which will feature iconic cricketers like Yuvraj Singh, Suresh Raina, and the Pathan brothers, will be broadcast live on Star Sports and Fancode. The Indian squad includes Yuvraj Singh, Suresh Raina, and the Pathan brothers, while Pakistan's squad includes Younus Khan, Shahid Afridi, and Shoaib Malik.
data.text:
Synopsis

India and Pakistan will face off in the final of the World Championship of Legends at Edgbaston Stadium on July 13. The match, which will feature iconic cricketers like Yuvraj Singh, Suresh Raina, and the Pathan brothers, will be broadcast live on Star Sports and Fancode. The Indian squad includes Yuvraj Singh, Suresh Raina, and the Pathan brothers, while Pakistan's squad includes Younus Khan, Shahid Afridi, and Shoaib Malik.

The stage is set for a cricketing extravaganza as the Indian Champions take on their arch-rivals, the Pakistan Champions, in the grand finale of the World Championship of Legends this Saturday at Edgbaston.

This match embodies a rich history of fierce competition and unforgettable moments. From the 2007 T20 World Cup to the 2011 and 2019 ODI World Cups, India and Pakistan have delivered countless thrilling encounters.

The Indian lineup, featuring icons like Yuvraj Singh, Suresh Raina, and the Pathan brothers, promises a display of high-octane cricket. Complementing this dynamic team is the ever-aggressive Robin Uthappa. Pakistan counters with their own legends, including Younus Khan, Shahid Afridi, and Shoaib Malik, all known for their game-changing abilities.

Throughout the tournament, fans have witnessed exhilarating performances, and the final is anticipated to be the pinnacle of this excitement. The match kicks off at 9 PM India time and will be broadcast live on Star Sports, with digital streaming available on Fancode.

As anticipation builds, cricket fans on both sides of the border and around the world are preparing for what promises to be an unforgettable night of cricketing excellence.

When is India vs Pakistan WCL final?

The final of the World Championship Of Legends 2024 is scheduled for Saturday, July 13 at 9:00 PM IST at the Edgbaston Stadium in Birmingham.

Where to watch India vs Pakistan final?

Fans can enjoy the live coverage of India vs Paksitan WCL 2024 final on the Star Sports 1 and Star Sports 1 HD channel in India. Live streaming is also available on FanCode app and website.

Squads:

India Champions Squad: Yuvraj Singh(captain), Robin Uthappa, Naman Ojha(w), Suresh Raina, Gurkeerat Singh Mann, Irfan Pathan, Yusuf Pathan, Vinay Kumar, Harbhajan Singh, Dhawal Kulkarni, RP Singh, Rahul Shukla, Saurabh Tiwary, Anureet Singh, Ambati Rayudu, Pawan Negi, Rahul Sharma

Pakistan Champions: Squad Younis Khan(captain), Kamran Akmal, Sohaib Maqsood(w), Shoaib Malik, Misbah-ul-Haq, Shahid Afridi, Sohail Tanvir, Wahab Riaz, Aamer Yamin, Sohail Khan, Saeed Ajmal, Sharjeel Khan, Abdul Razzaq, Taufeeq Umar, Mohammad Hafeez, Yasir Arafat, Umar Akmal, Tanvir Ahmed
